text: I attended a networking session here and was impressed by the column-free space and the open office layout. Simply amazing!
Nice building with lots of amenities onsite. Very well maintained.

I have the opportunity to share at capital tower auditorium. This is probably one of the rare commercial building in town that has such a sizeable lecture theatre.

I also enjoyed the spaciousness of its holding area where you can immediately mingle with the audience.

I do notice that the media set up is quite basic though
Amazing view discrete building are imposing and like aliens ships landed to our planet.

It's great that we now have a conducive space in the office to hold retail sales! Like the Bose sale in early July, where they had a nice setup and exclusive discounts for office tenants! Please keep 'em comin!!
